attributes.action: Inform politicians that democracy demands they adhere to the vote of the people.
attributes.additional_details: I have served this country unquestionably, with I believe honour and integrity, something which evidently is lacking in our politicians in both houses. Individuals are manipulating both news and media to spread doom and gloom.
attributes.background: The vote of the people was to leave the European Union, as the mother of Parliment they are duty bound to deliver the wishes of the people this is democracy, failure to do this will forever ridicule our political system

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the action you would like to see happen.
